entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle overnight. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
